doc:
Richard Epcar https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Epcar 0 Richard Epcar is an American actor and director who voices in a number of English-language localizations of Japanese animation, cartoons, and video games. Some of his major roles include Raiden in Mortal Kombat franchise, the Joker in Injustice: Gods Among Us, Zangetsu in Bleach, Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo in Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo, Etemon and Myotismon in Digimon, Batou in Ghost in the Shell, Ansem in Kingdom Hearts, Joseph Joestar in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders and JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond is Unbreakable, Black Ghost/Skull in Cyborg 009, Akuma in Street Fighter V, and Daisuke Jigen in Lupin the Third. He and fellow voice actress Ellyn Stern own and operate Epcar Entertainment, a voiceover production service company based in Los Angeles. On September 28, 2011, Epcar appeared on the podcast Disasterpiece Theatre to discuss his ideas for a live-action version of Ghost in the Shell. Richard_Epcar is an_American_actor and director who voices in a_number of English-language_localizations of Japanese_animation , cartoons , and video_games . Some of his_major_roles include Raiden in Mortal_Kombat_franchise , the_Joker in Injustice : Gods Among Us , Zangetsu in Bleach , Bobobo-bo_Bo-bobo in Bobobo-bo_Bo-bobo_,_Etemon_and_Myotismon in Digimon , Batou in Ghost in the_Shell_,_Ansem in Kingdom_Hearts , Joseph_Joestar in JoJo 's_Bizarre_Adventure : Stardust_Crusaders and JoJo 's_Bizarre_Adventure : Diamond is Unbreakable , Black_Ghost/Skull in Cyborg_009 , Akuma in Street_Fighter_V , and Daisuke_Jigen in Lupin the_Third . He and fellow_voice_actress_Ellyn_Stern_own_and operate Epcar_Entertainment , a_voiceover_production_service_company based in Los_Angeles . On September_28_,_2011 , Epcar appeared on the_podcast_Disasterpiece_Theatre to_discuss his_ideas for a_live-action_version of Ghost in the_Shell .
